Text: Thank you very much for all the time and effort you put into releasing your films.  I have downloaded many of them.  I would like to request Serendipity (2001) if by any chance you can get your hands on it.  If not, no big deal, have a great day!
Someone is watching this Torrent. Got a notice of action on a DMCA 2 days after I downloaded it. Just a heads up for everyone
Good quality audio and video, however, the movie is a terrible adaptation of the book. The book is excellent, the movie awful. Thanks for the upload.
This is being watched by Paramount. Warning sent by them to me via my ISP!!!

This is probably the only upload on TPB with English dialogue and English hard-encoded subtitles for the parts spoken in French. I wish the video quality was clearer but thank you so much for this rip!
